revised_title: Observations of the Solar Spectrum and the Existence of Matter in the Vicinity of the Sun
tldr: The Emperor of Brazil reports on his observations of the solar spectrum, revealing a complex and previously unknown composition. He discusses the existence of matter in the vicinity of the sun, which manifests during total eclipses through emission, absorption, and polarization phenomena. The presence of a rare hydrogen-based atmosphere extending beyond the chromosphere and protuberances is also confirmed.
